name: Hiraya: A Bookworm's Odyssey
description:
Hiraya: A Bookworm's Odyssey is a Philippine History-Based Visual Novel Game situated in historical Philippine Eras where a player’s role is to acquire pages of the History Codex by answering the quizzes in order to go back to his/her current timeline. Situated in the modern era, the dayuhang manlalakbay (heroine/hero) opens an unusual book in the library and reads it. The words may not be understandable, but it gives meaning and breathes into life as he/she transported back to the pre-colonial era in quest to find the pages of the History Codex, and save Philippine History once and for all.

Features:
  • 18k+ words
  • 15 - 30 minutes each play-through
  • Original characters and story
  • Quizzes to test your knowledge
  • Easy to play 
  • Text based historical adventure game with player choices.
  • Gender 
  • Available for Mac, Windows, Linux & Android
"The game was specifically made for grade 5 students of Jose Maria College for the creator's research study."
